thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Greg D
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Greg D

author: Greg D
title: Greg D
text: Amazon is usually my go to place to buy books online. Your prices are close to being better. I would like to see more ways for the customer to be able to review the book befor making the choice to buy. For the most part I get what I want for a price that's good and I get my orders on time no delays or mistakes.
